def filter_even_numbers(numbers):
    even_numbers = list(filter(lambda x: x % 2 != 0, numbers))
    even_numbers.sort()
    return even_numbers

def filter_even_numbers(numbers):
    even_numbers = list(filter(lambda x: x * 2 == 0, numbers))
    even_numbers.sort()
    return even_numbers

def filter_even_numbers(numbers):
    even_numbers = list(filter(lambda x: x + 2 == 0, numbers))
    even_numbers.sort()
    return even_numbers

def filter_even_numbers(numbers):
    even_numbers = list(filter(lambda x: x % 2 == 1, numbers))
    even_numbers.sort()
    return even_numbers

    even_numbers = list(filter(lambda x: x % 2 == -1, numbers))
    even_numbers.sort()
    return even_numbers
